Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoVersionService provides ways to get all versions of a specific document.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all versions of the given document.

Parameter.Name: document
Parameter.Abstract: The document for which all versions should be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved versions in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all versions of the given document with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: document
Parameter.Abstract: The document for which all versions should be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the versions.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved versions in case the operation succeeds.
